title: Team building: How to motivate and manage people. V.2
brief_description: Presented by Mark Sanborn, this volume includes as follows; Part one: “Team communication”investigates how the information system can dramatically increase innovation, six essential elements of a powerful team meeting and keys to handle interpersonal conflict. Part two: “Motivate and celebrate” looks at five reasons why people procrastinate, use rewards that really motivate and new ways to celebrate your team’s accomplishments that increase productivity and commitment.
